text:
Hi, guys!
I'm getting the following error when attempting to `hs project upload` :

_The current target account 43851620 does not have access to HubSpot projects. To opt in to the CRM Development Beta and use projects, visit <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/whats-new/betas?productUpdateId=13860216>._

This link won't lead me to an item to opt in. It falls back to the list of beta features.
None of them looks like the one I need to check.
Hi, what tiers do you have and can you also tell your role?

These are the permissions I have in my personal key access
I'm a developer (I'm not sure if that answers your question on my role).

hi guy!, I’ve got a few doubts about the custom app settings page. I created my own marketplace app with a test setting page (image 1) a few days ago, and I want to create a contact sync page (like images 2 and 3). i see docs but i don’t get how create like that. Could someone help me with this case?
